ok so after 2 full days of playing i've noticed a few things that may be looked at to improve it slightly 

1) The map is still a little too zoomed in and half the time you cant see the one attacking you due to the range of their abilities so perhaps have the camera zoomed out a little more might help.

2) The theory is sound about scaling quicker with more gold and experience however some champs still suffer due to the fact they need 3-4 items t become overly relevant like zilean or ziggs and xerath to name a few perhaps have starting gold like that of aram and a 3 level start instead of one to help as some cant even lane until lvl 3 because of combos to wave clear.

3) I understand that they are meant to be quick games but the 18 minute mobile nexus spawn it to keep that in check but ive had games where we were clearly winning about 2 minutes to kill there nexus and they aced us on a lucky fight and won this means that the win loss ratio will not accurately show skill or how close the games actually are so perhaps extend the spawn to 25 minutes perhaps.

4) Death timers i feel need to be adjusted to allow for quicker spawning to keep the game fair especially with mobile nexus as well as someone died 10 seconds before it spawned didn't even get to try and help defend it and lost because of that.

5) The events are really fun but the spawning of some things like the fire fight and king of the hill ones need to take into account map pressure as a team with 2 towers down are more pushed into their own base and cant go behind the enemies tier 1 turrets to try and win an event perhaps a new algorithm to adjust this may be in order but overall been going well so far will update if i see more issues.

Oh yeah and just found out just like all other modes that aren't summoners rift you cant advance your champion mastery past LvL 5 as i just played an awesome game of Ziggs on nexus blitz and got a S rank and still no champion mastery token to advance to LvL 6 mastery at all not happy.

Champions who scale with levels: Can we have those levels tuned down to suit the style of Nexus blitz?

One that comes to mind is Gangplank with the speed of his barrels (levels 7, 13). Can these levels be turned down so Gangplank can have faster barrels, earlier in the game considering these games will be really quick?

Everyone will be leveling up and gaining gold very quickly, so this should be accounted for.
Still, let us know how it feels in game. This is all very experimental and we'd love your feedback!
pretty sure you level up faster

Hopefully it's clear enough within the lobby and game that this mode is suppose to have two junglers, cause I expect people to not read this article, try the mode as jungler, then abuse the other jungler the whole time for imposing on 'their' position.

Teams are made up of 2 junglers and 3 laners, and these roles are visible in champ select. The junglers are also forced to take smite. So while it may still be a little unclear for some at first, I think players should quickly understand how the roles are structured.

Plus, good luck trying to clear those jungle camps alone, you actually need a second jungler to have any chance in the first few levels.

Yes having played it now I found it quite clear, the little game mode information page that came up when the queue was first accessed was a nice touch. However, the first time I played as jungler my partner still spammed the question mark ping and typed "what are you doing" in chat when I tried farming the same camps as him.

Incidentally I split up and did some camps alone and it didn't seem problematic. He was Graves and I was Amumu, our clear was sufficient that the Frog and Chickens were solo'd early on without being a particular threat. I also seen a Yi nearly solo the Rift herald before any turrets were lost, which was quite early, so I'm not sure the jungle difficulty is where it was intended.
From what ive seen on PBE, you prepick roles like in draft, you have 2 jungle roles available and 3 laners.
